DOC.brief_summary: Overall study design review National Health Nutrition Examination Survey ( NHANES ) data 1999-2008 nutrition risk accord kidney function . Substudies perform review association nutrient overall dietary intake compare biomarkers available NHANES period .
DOC.detailed_description: Data NHANES 2003-2006 used evaluate relationship estimate dietary phosphorus intake measure serum phosphorus . The following variable use : 1 . Demographics : Age , sex , race/ethnicity 2 . Dietary variable : Foods , food group ( report United States Department Agriculture ( USDA ) method , standardize Academy Nutrition Dietetics method portion size divide group inorganic phosphate additive inorganic phosphate additive ) , food weight ( g ) , phosphorus ( mg ) , dietary supplement 3 . Socioeconomic variable : education , family income 4 . Laboratory variable : serum creatinine , phosphorus ; urine albumin , creatinine 5 . Clinical assessment : hypertension ( proportion blood pressure ≥140 millimeter mercury ( mmHg ) diastolic ≥90 mmHg systolic take antihypertensive medication ) ; hyperglycemia ( proportion serum glucose > 126 mg/dL take medication diabetes ) ; kidney function base Chronic Kidney Disease Epidemiology Collaboration ( 2009 ) equation , evaluate 15 milliliters/min/1.73m2 increment < 15 > 105 ; anthropometrics ( BMI , kg/m2 ; obesity class I , II , III )
DOC.criteria: Serum creatinine Pregnancy No dietary intake interview Dietary intake interview valid Answered question `` Have dialysis past year ? '' `` Yes ''
